name: Department of Defense Impact Aid (Supplement, CWSD, BRAC)
objective: Reimbursement to local educational agencies (LEAs) for education related costs for military dependent children enrolled in the LEA during the specified school year.

results.description: These funds are a reimbursement to LEAs for education related costs for military dependent children enrolled in the LEA during the specified school year.
$70,000,000 was distributed to 121 school districts in 34 states.
In FY 2022, $70M was awarded to 122 school districts in 34 states.

authorizations.text: Floyd D. Spence National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2001. Pub. L. 106, 398. 20 U.S.C. § 7703a-7703b.

rules_regulations: See 20 U.S.C. § 7703a, 20 U.S.C. § 7703b, and Department of Defense Education Activity Administrative Instruction 1325.01., Department of Defense Impact Aid Program for Local Educational Agencies.
